CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Senior Care Group relative to Pediatric Patients?
SRP.A: Senior Care Group is {below} Pediatric Patients in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Pediatric Patients relative to Senior Care Group?
SRP.A: Pediatric Patients is {above} Senior Care Group in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total patient satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Pediatric Patients}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total patient satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Senior Care Group}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Senior Care Group's minimum Patient Satisfaction in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Senior Care Group's minimum Patient Satisfaction is in {1976}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Pediatric Patients's maximum Patient Satisfaction in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Pediatric Patients's maximum Patient Satisfaction is in {1963}.

NC.Q: Between 1967 and 1974, did the total Patient Satisfaction experience a larger or smaller change than between 1971 and 1978?
NC.A: The change in total patient satisfaction between 1967 and 1974 was {larger} than between 1971 and 1978.

NC.Q: Was the total Patient Satisfaction in 1973 higher or lower than in 1977?
NC.A: The total patient satisfaction in 1973 was {higher} than in 1977.

NC.Q: Between 1963 and 1970, did the total Patient Satisfaction experience a larger or smaller change than between 1972 and 1977?
NC.A: The change in total patient satisfaction between 1963 and 1970 was {larger} than between 1972 and 1977.

NC.Q: Between 1964 and 1970, did the total Patient Satisfaction experience a larger or smaller change than between 1966 and 1976?
NC.A: The change in total patient satisfaction between 1964 and 1970 was {smaller} than between 1966 and 1976.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Pediatric Patients} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Senior Care Group and Pediatric Patients first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Senior Care Group and Pediatric Patients first exchanged leading positions in {1965}.
